title: Deep Fake Detector Extension by Mozilla Firefox

excerpt: Download Deep Fake Detector for Firefox. The Fakespot Deepfake Detector extension will help you sort out text written by humans from text that has been created using AI tools.
text: The Fakespot Deepfake Detector extension will help you sort out text written by humans from text that has been created using AI tools.Features: The extension integrates our proprietary APOLLO method alongside multiple open-sourced detection models, making it simple to analyze any highlighted text. Analysis breaks down the results to show you what each model finds. Easily swap models in and out to find the combination that works best for you. Text is only the beginning - Image analysis and video analysis coming soonAfter installing the extension, it is simple to highlight any text online and request an instant analysis. Our Detector will tell you right away if the words are likely to be written by a human or if they show AI patterns.AI detection cannot be 100% accurate, but we continue to improve the Fakespot ApolloDFT Engine to make it as reliable as possible. See more about the reliability of all the engines you have access to with the extension here.How are you enjoying Deep Fake Detector?This add-on needs to:Store unlimited amount of client-side dataAccess your data for all websitesThis add-on may also ask to:Access your data for all websites
html:
The Fakespot Deepfake Detector extension will help you sort out text written by humans from text that has been created using AI tools.
Features:

  • The extension integrates our proprietary APOLLO method alongside multiple open-sourced detection models, making it simple to analyze any highlighted text.
  • Analysis breaks down the results to show you what each model finds. Easily swap models in and out to find the combination that works best for you.
  • Text is only the beginning - Image analysis and video analysis coming soon
    After installing the extension, it is simple to highlight any text online and request an instant analysis. Our Detector will tell you right away if the words are likely to be written by a human or if they show AI patterns.

AI detection cannot be 100% accurate, but we continue to improve the Fakespot ApolloDFT Engine to make it as reliable as possible. See more about the reliability of all the engines you have access to with the extension here.

How are you enjoying Deep Fake Detector?

This add-on needs to:

  • Store unlimited amount of client-side data
  • Access your data for all websites

This add-on may also ask to:

  • Access your data for all websites
